item.title: Create Notification Subscription
item.description:
This section describes how to create a notification subscription.

Note

Currently, only email notification subscriptions are supported.

Prerequisites

  • You should have the Platform Settings Management permission on the KubeSphere platform. For more information, refer to "Platform Roles".

  • WhizardTelemetry Notification should have been installed and enabled.

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Platform Settings Management permission.

  2. Click in the upper-right corner of the KubeSphere web console to enter the Platform Settings page.

  3. Select Notification Management > Notification Subscription in the left navigation pane.

  4. On the Notification Subscription page, click Create under the Email tab.

item.title: Edit Notification Subscription
item.description:
This section describes how to edit a notification subscription.

Prerequisites

  • You should have the Platform Settings Management permission on the KubeSphere platform. For more information, refer to "Platform Roles".

  • WhizardTelemetry Notification should have been installed and enabled.

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Platform Settings Management permission.

  2. Click in the upper-right corner of the KubeSphere web console to enter the Platform Settings page.

  3. Select Notification Management > Notification Subscription in the left navigation pane.

  4. On the Notification Subscription page, under the Email tab, view the list of created notification subscriptions.

  5. Click on the right side of the notification subscription, and then select Edit Notification Subscription from the dropdown list.

  6. On the Edit Notification Subscription page, edit the information, and then click OK.

item.title: Delete Notification Subscriptions
item.description:
This section describes how to delete a notification subscription.

Prerequisites

  • You should have the Platform Settings Management permission on the KubeSphere platform. For more information, refer to "Platform Roles".

  • WhizardTelemetry Notification should have been installed and enabled.

Delete a Single Notification Subscription

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Platform Settings Management permission.

  2. Click in the upper-right corner of the KubeSphere web console to enter the Platform Settings page.

  3. Select Notification Management > Notification Subscription in the left navigation pane.

  4. On the Notification Subscription page, under the Email tab, view the list of created notification subscriptions.

  5. Click on the right side of the notification subscription, and then select Delete from the dropdown list.

  6. In the Delete Notification Subscription dialog, enter the name of the notification subscription, and then click OK.
